relation.text: 1786 What my dear is the reason my dear Brother of your very long silence , do you think
expostulated with her on the impropriety of such a connexion , last Friday
believe me yr . Sincere friend & humble Servant Mary Glover PS whenever John Dickenson Junr- Esqr Windsor near Taxal Chapel le Frith single Sheet Miſs Glover Novm . 1786
